trends: There have been no other sightings in Hubbardton

divs: sighting detailsme & the family were headed south on rt 30 from sudbury towards castleton just as we broke the crest of the ridge after lake hortino it was in the sky above about 6 degrees off the horizon, the sun was intensely reflecting off of it, at first i thougth the sun had moved, but you could see the sun was still sw & this was se, i woudl say it was about 1\8 the size of the sun in the sky that afternoon, just as i had to watch the road & looked back up it was gone
